# Line

**Enumeration Case**

A line-level stream.

## Declaration

```swift
Line
```

## Discussion

This terminal type applies to both input and output streams.

## Audio Interfaces

- **DigitalAudioInterface**: A stream to or from a digital audio interface, defined by ISO 60958.

items.description: A stream to or from a digital audio interface, defined by ISO 60958.
